transcript:
Customer: Hello. Hello.
Executive: Yes sir. Good morning Ajay baat kar raha tha IndiaMART se sir.
Customer: Ha jo complaint tha na wo.
Executive: Ji ji ji ji.
Customer: O ji me wahi mujhe chahiye sir.
Executive: Ha boliye kya dikkat aa rahi thi.
Customer: Ji hamara IndiaMART me jo by lead aata hai.

Customer: Hello.

Customer: Hello. Ji hamara jo lead aata hai na lead.
Executive: Ji ji.
Customer: Wo lead nahi aa raha hai order ek bhi nahi aa raha hai ek saal ho gaya order nahi aa raha.

Executive: Achcha.
Customer: Ji hamare container business ke liye khula tha 30000 le liya tha lekin IndiaMART opening hua tha.
Executive: Ji ji.
Customer: To sir ek bhi order nahi aaye aur ek bhi order nahi jo hai malik humko paisa waste ho gaya ye ho gaya.

Executive: Achcha.
Customer: Abhi humko container business kaise kare aapko lead nahi aa raha hai kaise kare to ek hi month last month hai.
Executive: Ye abhi November month hai ye aapka agle mahine khatam ho raha hai na ab package vagaira sab kuch.
Customer: Ji. Package khatam ho gaya lekin order nahi ek bhi nahi aa raha.
Executive: Dekhiye sir do teen isme issue tha. Pehla to reason ye raha ki isme hame jo leads di jati hai na wo use nahi hua proper.
Executive: Ab proper hum log jitna dete hain 68 by lead dete hain aap pure mahine ka theek hai.
Executive: Aur wo jab tak use nahi hoga na tab tak ek bhi business aane ka nahi hai. Samajhiye ki ye ki hum aapka catalog open kar diya theek hai online mein. But waha pe aap jitna bhi leads aa raha hai jitna bhi aapke paas inquiry aa raha hai call aa raha hai usko attend nahi karoge to business kahan se milega hai na. Hamara to B to B hai na na ki B to C hai sir ki hamara online store ban gaya hame ab add to card karke seedha payment aayega hai na.
Customer: Hame to buyer se to baat kar baat hua tha na baat wo ek aadmi tha wo baat kar raha tha lekin koi order nahi aa raha hai wo bol raha hai ki kar raha hai kar raha hai mar raha hai aise bol raha hai lekin order dene ke liye jo model aata hai na wo nahi aata hai.
Executive: Nahi isme dekhiye hum log ka kya rehta hai na jo 68 by lead hum dete hain. Theek hai. Wo to proper jab use karenge tab jaakar hum usme se 10 ya 15.
Customer: Theek hai. Main wo bol raha hu ki jo proper 68 order aata hai na. Hello. Ji. Ha ha. Wo kahan pe aata hai home pe na by leads mein na lead manager mein na kahan pe. Yaar wo ek tarah ka lead balance hota hai wo theek hai. Ha pehle me hai suno by lead me wo aata hai kya Odisha se hum log kaise wo aata hai Chhattisgarh Kolkata West Bengal Karnataka aise aa raha hai hum udhar order denge kya.
Executive: Nahi udhar mat dijiye aap apne near by state mein dijiye jahan aapko preferred waha dijiye to waha ka lead aapko consume karna padega na sir.
Customer: Nahi nahi ji wahi me lead hum Odisha me lead to Odisha ka koi bhi lead nahi aata hai jo aapne wo bola hai ki abhi by list me aata hai by list me pura bharpur hota hai abhi bhi aa raha hai ek aadha pe lag raha hai Chhattisgarh hum Chhattisgarh me order denge kya.
Executive: Nahi nahi nahi waha pe aap thodi dijiyega.
Customer: Ji main wahi bol raha hu ki hamara Odisha me jo lead hota hai Odisha ka lead dijiye Odisha me jo customer dta hai container vagaira Odisha ka dijiye Odisha ka aap log ek bhi nahi de rahe lekin wo sab bahar aata hai Chhattisgarh Karnataka Delhi UP Karnataka China wo dusri side mein Odisha ka ek bhi nahi aata hai.
Executive: To sirf aap Odisha mein karte hain.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: To aapka Bhuvneshwar Katak aur teen jagah aapka bana hai.
Customer: Ha main wahi bol raha hu Bhuvneshwar Katak hamara Barampur Bhadrak aise aise jagah Sambhalpur Dalkela aise to ho payega na Paradip lekin aap bol rahe ki udhar Chhattisgarh Haryana ye wo hum log kaise lenge udhar transporting to koi lega kya transporting itna transporting ho jayega koi lega kya.
Executive: Dekhiye abhi zero second pehle hi ye Odisha Bhuvneshwar ka ek aaya portable cabin turant aap consume kariye isko.
Customer: Kya ek humko nahi show kar raha hai isliye to main bol raha hu.
Executive: Aap open to kariye dekhiye abhi abhi just aaya zero second pehle dikha raha hai ye. Ha ha aa raha hai ha ha abhi ek hi aaya hai abhi.
Customer: Turant consume kariye usko abhi nahi to wo bhi sold out ho jayega.
Executive: Nahi to wahi bol raha hu.
Customer: By lead se uta se ta bol ka.
Customer: Main wahi bol raha hu ki wo jo hai na wo abhi main bola to abhi dena hai Odisha wahi me wahi bol raha hu ki bar bar wo jagah aa raha hai lekin Odisha ka koi nahi aa raha hai wo bol jo.
Customer: Na na Odisha.
Customer: Ta thodu de.

Customer: Hello. Ye Bhagalpur Bihar chala gaya kya.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello. Ji Odisha ka kahan gaya wo to aaya fir wo kidhar kat gaya.
Executive: Consume nahi kar paye aap.
Customer: Nahi wo nahi wo nahi show kar raha hai wo by lead me nahi show kar raha hai.
Executive: Sold out ho gaya sir.
Customer: Sold out kya itna second ek second ek hi second me sold out hota hai.
Executive: Ji ji ji bahut tej hota hai na isliye to maine kaha turant ka turant open karke consume kariye.
Customer: Nahi wo bolte the ki jo lead manager manager hai na.
Executive: Hmm. Waha pe aayega waha pe wo message jayega notice aayega waha pe baat karne ke wo baat kar lenge to ho jayega.
Executive: To consume kara na abhi aapko contact bar pe click kiya ki nahi kiya aapne ye bataye.
Customer: Wo usme call karne ke liye wo dikha aata hai message aata hai zero domestic lead balance.
Executive: System pe hai abhi aap available.
Customer: Ha abhi to hum system pe hai.
Executive: Main Gmail ID bataye kaun sa use kar rahe hai abhi aap system pe.

Executive: System pe kaun sa mail ID aap use kar rahe hai.
Customer: System wala dekhiye.
Customer: Ha ek minute rukiye.

Customer: Google Chrome company name.
Customer: Main wahi bol raha hu ki lead aana hai to jo hamara Odisha ka lead dijiye thoda hamara malik itna chul raha hai.
Executive: Sir aapke do number se dono number ke maine call kar kar ke pareshan ho gaya do number aapke yaha pe registered hai theek hai.
Customer: Ha ek do ki mera saar ka number hai lekin main wahi number baat karne ke liye wo jo customer ko diya tha mera number dijiye main baat karne ke liye.
Executive: Nahi lekin wo jab call karta hai to baat hi nahi karenge to kahan se main help kar paunga hai na.
Customer: Ji yahi number mera number hai.
Executive: Jab koi problem batayega tab to hum solution de payenge.
Customer: Problem problem to wahi hai ek ki na ek ki aap hi socho 30000 diye the humne ek ki ek saal ho gaya ek hi order nahi aaya hai malik bolega na.
Executive: Main main baat manta hu sir lekin aap ye bhi to bolo ki ha agar main call kar raha hu to solution dene ke liye ya fir har mahine ka ek bar feedback lene ke liye to call karte hain lekin aap log baat nahi karoge to hum kahan se solution de payenge batao na aap.
Customer: Wo log ka malum nahi hai wo log ko dusra kam me busy hai.
Executive: To fir hamari galti thodi hui na sir yaha pe. Hum to aapko call continuous kare ja rahe hai na kare ja rahe hai na. Do teen din se main abhi to renewal ka aaya to renewals ke liye bhi maine call kar raha hu whatsapp pe message kar raha hu lekin abhi aapka jab complaint aaya tab naya number mujhe nikal ke aaya ki ha ye number pe mujhe call karni hai.
Customer: Tabhi to call kar renewal me kitna amount hai suno research jab khatam ho jayega fir kitna amount dena padega.
Executive: Aapka jo previous amount jo hai same wahi rahega 28000 plus GST 3340 denge tab ja ke aapka renewal hoga ye.
Customer: 40000 ek saal ke liye.
Executive: Nahi nahi 3340 28000 plus GST.
Customer: 33000. Ha 33440 rupees. Wo bol rahe the jo aaye the wo bol rahe the ki 5000 10000 me ho jayega.
Executive: Kaun bol raha tha. Jo open karne ke liye aaye the. Kab open karne ke liye aaye the IndiaMART se baat karne ke liye IndiaMART me jo aaye the do aadmi. Nahi aisa kuch nahi hai IndiaMART jab aapko first time bhi jab host hua tha usme bhi aapko kitna diye the 28000 plus GST hi diya tha aapne. Ha 28000 plus GST to hamare to hamara jab starting package 28000 plus GST to 4000 5000 me 10000 me kaise hoega. Agar yahi rehta to aapko starting jab 11 mahine pehle 12 mahine pehle jab diya gaya tha to usi time aapko nahi de dete. Nahi wo bolte the ki pehle fast opening hua tha fast open hoga to itna lagega fir dusre time me kam ho jayega. Nahi nahi nahi nahi kabhi aisa nahi ho sakta sir. Aap pata kariye pehle IndiaMART employee the ya nahi the wo. Ha IndiaMART employee hona unko bhi phone kiya tha wo log kal a rahe hai aapko a jayenge. Kab hai. Bhuvneshwar Bhuvneshwar me ho. Koi nahi sakta ye possible hi nahi hai. Ye aapke number hai na personal number hai na company number hai. Ye company ka number hota hai sir jo maine aapko whatsapp kiya hai wo mera personal number hai. Ji main aapke sath abhi contact me hunga matlab ek ki ye saal me November me panch order chahiye Odisha ka. Ha. Aapko dekhiye jo main aapko kar ye sakta hu ki jyada se jyada aapko sari cheeze main guide kar sakta hu ki kaise aapko frequently use karna hai theek hai leads aapko kaise consume karna hai wo sab cheeze hame batana padega sir. Ji bataye mere ko mere ko wahi container panch ye saal month ka November month ka mere ko. Aap mujhe wo bataye mail ID kaun sa abhi system use kar rahe hai ek bar main google ke team pe join karke aapko sari cheeze ek bar guide kar du. Mail ID to mail ID IndiaMART me malum ho jayega na mail ID koi bhi koi kiska vision@gmail.com. Aap dekhiye koi mail aaya hai kya Ajay Kumar Gupta ke naam se. Unka mail ID to unko hi jayega na malik ko jayega. Nahi system pe koi login hai nahi hai. System me login nahi hai sirf phone me login hai. To system me kaise join kariyega main google meeting ka link bhejuunga to. System pe bej du. Ha whatsapp pe bej du. Whatsapp me bej do. Whatsapp me join system pe login hai na ye whatsapp wala. Whatsapp system me login ha whatsapp system me login hai. Ha join kijiye waha se. Bheja hu aapko aapke jo number tha usse. Ye number me bhejiye. Ha check kariye.

Ji sir whatsapp pe wo boliye. Ha usme link gaya na aapko google meeting ka. Join kijiye usko. Pehle link bhejiye. Ye ho gaya. Main aapko dikh raha hu. Ha dikh raha hai. Theek hai. To isme system pe aawaz aata hai nahi aata. Nahi nahi system pe aawaz nahi aata. Achcha to ek kam kardiye main aapko normal call kar raha hu theek hai. Okay okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants Odisha-based buyleads for container business.

- No orders received despite paying ₹30,000.

- Expresses frustration over wasted money.

- Current leads are from different states.



Resolution:

- Executive explained how to consume buyleads.

- Executive offered to guide on Google Meet.

- Executive shared the renewal amount details.



Next Steps: 

- Executive sent Google Meet link on WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, odisha, container, renewal, google meet
